website_summaries.verdict: Don't miss out on this adorable reindeer and cute story book if your child already loves the classic tale of the scout elf.
pros: A memorable story of how Santa relies on reindeer and the spirit of Christmas to power his sleigh
Comes with an soft 8 1/4" plush reindeer
cons: The reindeer doesn't stand up very well – tends to fall over
Rare reports of the book arriving without the reindeer

customer_reviews.title: Great pal for your elf
customer_reviews.text: My kids saw the ad on tv and asked me why our elf didn't have a reindeer. Well, i didn't have an answer for that so I told them to go ask the elf and then I went on amazon to buy the little guy. I'm a sucker for all the "elf magic". It brings so much joy to the kids. This is a great addition because the kids actually get to touch the reindeer and snuggle with it. The story itself is really adorable too. Plus you'll be using it for years of Christmas magic. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Burgan

customer_reviews.title: A must have companion for all Elves and a wonderful addition to our Christmas experience
customer_reviews.text: My son asked Max, our elf, for a reindeer, and boy was he excited when Jingles made his appearance. Unlike the reindeer in the stores, this one is extra special and comes directly from the North Pole. He also has some magic as well and combined with his elf, these two can get into some big trouble. A must have companion for all Elves and a wonderful addition to our Christmas experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Zaun

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: During the last post-Christmas sale at my local garden center, I bought this stuffed reindeer as a toy for my puppy as the reindeer was knocked down to half price since it got separated the book. This toy is very well stitched, it isn't filled with noxious plastic beads and the eyes are stitched on tight and are not plastic. My dogs absolutely adores the thing. They run around and shake it it wildly and play tug-a-war with it, but it hasn't torn like most of their other toys. This year I purchased a second one so they each have their own then gave the book away to a friend to read to her toddler grandchild this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: N. S.

customer_reviews.title: Trusty Partner
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to our Elf on The Shelf family mythology. As we also introduced the Krampus in the Corner as a comic foil to Roddy (our Elf) this year, it was nice for him to have a trusty partner for his adventures. Unfortunately, we have an older child that is "post-belief" and loves stuffed animals. So we had to explain to our son that the reindeer had some special Santa errands to run to explain why she would leave Roddy's side from time to time (his Sissy absconded with it). Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D

customer_reviews.title: Great Accessory for Elf on the Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an accessory to Elf on the Shelf. Granddaughters loved it since they could pick it up and not the Elf. I eventually bought 2 more so they could each have their own reindeer for their Elf at Christmas time. I would suggest if your going to bye more than one to do it early since Amazon had run out of them after I purchased mine.
customer_reviews.author: squeakycat1

customer_reviews.title: Because every elf needs a reindeer
customer_reviews.text: Donner, the name my daughter thought up for our reindeer, is a great addition to our ensemble of scout elves and pets. We have this reindeer and the St Bernard, as well as a scout elf. My 9 year old daughter is a bit obsessed with the magic of the Elf on a Shelf. She watches the YouTube videos of the Elf shenanigans, even. These pets now have names and stories of their own in my house. Harmless fun to get the kids in the spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Reindeer is very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great and my kids loved the story and fought over who gets to cuddle with the reindeer. The reason for 2 stars is because the build quality is pretty poor on the stuffed animal itself. After 4 days the reindeer has a hole in the seam on it's belly where it wasn't sewn properly. We have had the Elf On A Shelf on 5 or 6 years with no issues, but for this to be intended to have kids cuddle with it, I'm very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: T. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love their 'Elf Pet', Jack. I also bought theto make him super spiffy. I recommend both this product (the elf pet) and the PJs. Also, I bought this Reindeer cheaper on Amazon (1/2 the price) than they sell for at Target or Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Reads

customer_reviews.title: Very cute addition to the Christmas family
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved that our elf had a new pet Reindeer to get in to trouble with. It's soft and the book says it's for cuddling, but we made ours magical too so the kids couldn't fight over who gets him.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Shmerling

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters Love Her
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters loved waking each morning to find what mischief "Cindy" had gotten into... hanging from the ceiling fan, asleep on the TV, eating M&M's... Great Elf...
customer_reviews.author: Possum

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It seems like nice quality but it still hasn't been opened because it is a Christmas gift.The book is good size,the packaging was sturdy and the deer is really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion to your Elf on the Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect friend for your Elf on the Shelf. I purchase this as a gift for my three year old grandson. My daughter and her family have an elf of the shelf named Peppermint was gets into all kinds of trouble in the days approaching Christmas. He sleeps with his reindeer every night and jumps out of bed every morning to discover what kind of mischief the elf has gotten himself into that morning.
customer_reviews.author: Dylans Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than at the big box store
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted a pet this year, and this one was over $5 cheaper than the exact same ones at the store. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Little girl loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my 7 yr old and she loves it! She takes it everywhere with her and loves that she can hug and shower it with love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani D.Catlett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collectible-/
customer_reviews.text: The savvy creators of elf on the shelf do not disappoint with this rhyming story. Kudos to them for thinking of a way to add a Christmas tradition into our family’s repertoire! It was as if the author was speaking directly to my child— a moving story indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elf on the Shelf Pet Reindeer
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. Very well made and packaged. She loves the reindeer, all it's accessories, the book that tells it's history, and the box that is made like a stable! I thought it was pricey before it arrived, but it's quality and my granddaughters love of the gift was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing plush reindeer in package!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where’s the plush reindeer? This order was to include the book and plush reindeer...there was NO reindeer.
customer_reviews.author: MariVic

customer_reviews.title: The response I got back was that he loved it! If you have an Elf on the ...
customer_reviews.text: When my grandson asked for this item for Christmas, I had no idea what it was. But I found out, bought it and sent it to him. The response I got back was that he loved it! If you have an Elf on the Shelf, he should have a pet of his own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Reindeer
customer_reviews.text: I only received the book. No Reindeer. I read and re-read the description and it said the reindeer was included. Even gave the size of the stuffed animal. Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, could be sewn better
customer_reviews.text: Loved that our elf had a companion this year. However, the reindeer does not stand well on his own. I had to keep positioning his legs in a certain way or else he just falls over.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful story and doll.
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved this! It was a great addition to her elf on the shelf. The story book was beautiful and I absolutely loved the pictures. The only thing I wish they would have done is removed the tag off the doll itself like they have for the elf. My sister was confused about the tag. Overall the doll and the book was gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Cannot wait for Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for next Christmas so Chippey can show up with him. A little spendy but nice I could order and not have him see it in my shopping cart at the store and ruin the surprise. Wish it was less money. Everything else is perfect. Stitching and detail is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Elf on the shelf reindeer
customer_reviews.text: Cute with the elf. Grandchildren loved their elf having a companion. Your suppose to only have 1 elf per family so this worked great with the 2 nd grandchild

customer_reviews.title: Elf on the Shelf pet...cute
customer_reviews.text: We liked the little book that describes the pet's story, and how it adds to the magic of him returning with the elf on Christmas eve. A bit overpriced however.

product_meta.title: Elf on the Shelf Pets Reindeer
product_meta.description: From the creators of the Elf on the Shelf comes elf pets reindeer - a special North pole friend, straight from Santa's stables. Already a best friend to the Scout elves, this snuggly reindeer is sure to be a hit with every child who loves their elf! each reindeer set comes complete with the Elf on the Shelf: elf pets storybook and an "actual" reindeer who must use his heart full of Christmas magic to help Santa's sleigh fly on Christmas Eve - as the nine original reindeer are in need of help. Just like their Scout elf friends, reindeer must be given a name. However, unlike Scout elves the reindeer need to be loved and hugged to build up the Christmas magic in their hearts - so children can hold them tight! each reindeer sports an elf-like collar and sparkly heart-shaped pendant. They are constructed of the softest plush that Santa could find and measure 8.25" tall.
feature_bullets: A scout elf's best friend with a dose of Christmas magic in its heart!
Comes with a book which tells the story of how reindeer use Christmas magic to help Santa's sleigh fly on Christmas Eve

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,064 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
